entry.title: LOT OF 10 NEW - HP USB WIRED KEYBOARD - BLACK # 539130-DB1 (Canadian Bilingual)
entry.summary:
Vendor: HP
Type: Computers/Tablets & Networking:Keyboards, Mice & Pointers:Keyboards & Keypads
Price: 199.99




LOT OF 10 NEW - HP USB WIRED KEYBOARD
BLACK PN# 539130-DB1
(Canadian Bilingual)

THIS LISTING IS FOR 10x KEYBOARDS

This HP 539130-DB1 black keyboard delivers comfort and convenience - with a style that will complement any desktop! Its fold out feet and slim design provides superior comfort for all computer users!

The HP 539130-DB1 USB Kb comes with volume control and sleep hotkey is easy to setup with its plug and play connection.  This USB keyboard was designed for use with any computer, but is compatible with any Windows, Linux or Mac based computer or notebook/laptop with a USB 2.0 or USB 1.1 port.  The slim ergonomic feature was designed for your comfort and productivity.

Order your HP 539130-DB1 keyboard today!


Features/Specifications:
  • HP 539130-201 109-key USB Keyboard (Black)
  • General Features :
  • USB interface
  • 109-keys
  • Three (3) LED indicators
  • Color : Black
  • Lightweight
  • Feet on bottom for height adjustment
  • Installation : Plug n Play
  • Design : Slim, Stylish
  • Design : Ergonomically designed for your comfort
  • Box Dimensions : 19 W x 1.5 H x 7 D (inch)
  • Box Weight : 665 grams
  • Product Dimensions : 18.25 W x 1 H x 6 D (inch)
  • Product Weight : 565 grams
  • Keyboard Special Hotkeys & Functions :
  • Volume Control
  • Mute
  • Sleep
Package Includes:
  • HP 539130-DB1 107-key USB Keyboard (Black)
Additional Information:
  • Notes:
  • ASSY P/N : 539130-DB1
  • SPARES P/N : 537924-DB1

  • Product Requirements:
  • Available USB port
